entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests on Mono_Minijit_Debug-Ubuntu #100715
    9.0.0
  • [ARM] Potential codegen issues on Graviton3 #100705
  • WinDbg doesn't break on first chance managed exceptions with the new EH enabled #100701
    9.0.0
  • Move reflection invocation in coreclr to fully managed way #100696
    9.0.0
  • Stress issues on x86 in JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/V8/Crypto/Crypto/Crypto.dll #100695
  • Stress failure on x86 in JIT/IL_Conformance/Convert/TestConvertFromIntegral/TestConvertFromIntegral.dll #100694
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort: Under Linux, closing the port while writing cause a deadlock. #100690
  • Attributes taking object as a parameter have unexpected behavior in AOT #100688
  • Path.ChangeExtension with an empty string behaves differently on Linux and Windows platforms #100687
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests failed on linux-x64 running interpreter #100683
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Utf8JsonReader.TryGetBytesFromBase64(Span<byte> span, out int bytesWritten)` overload #100670
    Future
  • DateTimeOffset - ToLocalTime().DateTime and ToUniversalTime().DateTime return wrong DateTimeKind #100667
  • Cannot install wasi-experimental: Not found in NuGet feeds #100666
  • In certain cases on MacOS, LINQ and IEnumerator::MoveNext() causes stack overflow #100663
  • JIT: Unify `InlinedCallFrame` secret stub arg handling #100662
    Future
  • Utf8Parser.TryParse ignores the provided format for bool #100659

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(arg.GetEarlyNode() == nullptr) != (arg.GetLateNode() == nullptr)' during 'Rationalize IR' #73634
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!"Unknown operator for loop increment"' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #85631
    Future
  • [JitOptRepeat] Assertion failed 'limit->OperGet() == GT_ARR_LENGTH' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74785
    Future
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #99266
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportTest.MissingImport test fails on CI leg: browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_Threading #100421
    9.0.0
  • Is AuthenticationManager obsolete #77459
    9.0.0
  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #100414
    9.0.0
  • Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable("DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT") does not return the environment variable's value entered in the CLI #100674
  • Linq's Count method makes unnecessary enumeration #100677
  • Roadmap to remove obsolete member in BCL? #100679
  • HttpClient Adding Custom External Protocol #100668
  • [release/8.0] va_start/va_end compile time errors with clang 18 + libstdc++ 14 #99825
  • NegotiateStream_StreamToStream_Authentication_EmptyCredentials_Fails fails with The credentials supplied to the package were not recognized #97530
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix WinDbg first chance exception notification #100714
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix KeyInfoX509Data encoding negative serial numbers #100713
    area-System.Security
  • Fix official build: disable compile-native runtime component libraries for linux-bionic #100712
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix bug in virtual annotation logic for RequiresUnreferencedCode #100707
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify jitconfigvalues.h #100704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] chrome crash testing #100702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add feature switch to disable COM type descriptors #100693
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Path.ChangeExtension behavior with empty extension (#100687) #100691
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add missing property to include native libraries for Apple mobile native linker #100689
    area-Infrastructure, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Saturating floating point to integer conversions on Arm32 #100682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take into account the provided format in Utf8Parser.TryParse for bool #100676
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack as library pack #100672
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in Release builds #100665
    area-System.Net
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][interp] Minor fixes #100661
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Delete odd definition of VolatileLoad/Store #100660
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Use Arcade log publishing instead of our own publishing #100566
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix VS user unhandled exception notification #100673
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Add build option to build Mac .dSYM debug symbol bundles #100617
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Azure Linux 3.0 deps package #100684
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Change export name mangling to match expectations #100652
    area-Build-mono
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] eslint more autofix #100681
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    arch-wasm, linkable-framework, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • Add -cross flag to build.ps1 #100678
    area-Infrastructure
  • RSABCrypt: Improve errors with public key only #100658
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add basic cdacreader project #100623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Azure Linux 3.0 deps package #100656
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [mono][infra] Enable runtime tests in fullAOT LLVM mode on linux-x64 #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure Array.CreateInstance over reference types works #100626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add timeout for dpkg frontend lock #100653
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.SizeOf #100618
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100630
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix compact time computation #100599
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing and remove prepare-artifacts.proj #100004
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Reloading sources in ConfigurationManager should not dispose IConfigurationSources, only providers #100641
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • HttpContent disposal in HttpClientJsonExtensions #100643
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100649
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100648
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [browser][MT] improve abort on web worker #100610
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix SslStreamCertificateContext OCSP test failures #100644
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Fix assertion for auipc and lui #100578
    community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
